Description.Text: Hotel Fifty Seven is in the heart of New York City, on 57th Street which is world renown for shopping. Its close proximity to 5th Avenue, Central Park and the Museum Mile are a perfect combination for all of its guests.

The hotel is located on East 57th Street between Park and Lexington Avenues, New York. Some of the nearby attractions are Central Park, Carnegie Hall, Broadway Theater District and Museum of Modern Art.

Hotel 57's 199 stylish boutique-like guest rooms provide a comfortable setting for guests traveling on business or pleasure. Each room features luxurious high thread count cotton linens, flat-screen TVs, working desk areas and bathrooms with ultra-modern designs and marble tiling. • STANDARD (200-250 SQ.FT.) Each Standard room has a full size bed with reading lights, working desk area, and individually controlled heating & air conditioning. • SUPERIOR (260-330 SQ.FT.) Each Superior room has a queen or king sized bed or two full sized. They offer additional space and are ideal for the individual traveler.

Hotel 57, located in the heart of Midtown Manhattan's East Side, has undergone a $22 million renovation to become one of New York City's finest boutique hotels. Serene, Sophisticated And with 199 completely redesigned guest rooms and suites featuring custom furniture and state-of-the-art amenities. Guests will find themselves just steps away from New York City's finest designer shops, top restaurants and all the major attractions of Manhattan. At 57th and Lexington, it's a setting that provides high style to both business travelers and vacationers alike.
• Biking trail • Hiking • Horseback riding • Jogging/fitness trail (0.5 miles) • Mountain biking, trail • Rock climbing • Volleyball

• From JF Kennedy Airport - JFK: From JFK - Follow signs to Van Wyck Expressway and merge with Grand Central Parkway. Take Grand Central Parkway West to Triboro Bridge to FDR South to 53rd Street Exit. Stay on 53rd Street until Park Ave, then turn right onto Park and take another right onto 57th Street. Hotel is on the right at the Corner before Lexington Ave.
• From La Guardia Airport - LGA: Take Grand Central Parkway West to Triboro to FDR South to 53rd Street Exit. Stay on 53rd Street until Park Ave, then turn right onto Park and take another right onto 57th Street. Hotel is on the right at the Corner before Lexington Ave.
Opia is located on the second floor of the hotel and is an exciting French fusion restaurant and lounge. Opia serves lunch and dinner daily.

With many local attractions and amazing amenities; the Hotel 57 is the perfect place to spend your vacation Major attractions; ample shopping venues and all the amenities you desire await your arrival
